# HELP scylla_manager_repair_token_ranges_error Number of segments that failed to repair.
# TYPE scylla_manager_repair_token_ranges_error gauge

# HELP scylla_manager_repair_token_ranges_success Number of repaired token ranges.
# TYPE scylla_manager_repair_token_ranges_success gauge

# TYPE scylla_manager_repair_token_ranges_total gauge
